doc_class_description: A Court of Appeal judgment is a higher court ruling that reviews decisions of lower courts, shaping legal precedent and protecting citizens’ rights.

latest_doc_d.description: Environmental Foundation (Guarantee) Limited Vs Chandana Sooriyabandara and Others before Hon. S.U.B. Karalliyadde, J.
latest_doc_d.parties: Environmental Foundation (Guarantee) Limited Vs Chandana Sooriyabandara and Others
latest_doc_d.keywords: Wilpattu National Park, Section 5(1), 5(2), 6(1), 72 and 67C of the Fauna and Flora Protection Ordinance, necessary parties
latest_doc_d.legistation: The Fauna and Flora Protection Ordinance, No. 02 of 2002 (as amended) and the Constitution of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka.
